meta_description: The Air Zoo, located in Kalamazoo, MI, offers an exciting educational experience like no other. Featuring more than 100 air and space artifacts, Air Zoo also includes multiple interactive and educational exhibits such as full-motion flight simulators and amusement park rides. Buy Air Zoo tickets online and plan your trip today.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

Go for launch!

# Admission Options

The Air Zoo is open to inspire 7 days a week: Monday-Saturday, 9am-5pm; and Sunday, noon - 5pm.__

Guest | Admission  
---|---  
Air Zoo Members | FREE

¹**2 Day Passes** are to be used for two (2) consecutive days. Cannot be combined with other discounts or offers.

admission_text:
# Visiting Aircraft

##### Visiting WARBIRDS

# **FLY-IN****For some fun this summer!**

If you love history, engines, props, pilots - or just _plane_ fun - swing out to the Air Zoo this summer for some exciting visits from some of our favorite flying friends! These historic aircraft will be on display at the Air Zoo's Flight Discovery Center (FDC) and flights are available for purchase. Most also have ticketed tour options as well. Make sure to check out there cool merchandise and come out to welcome them to the area! See below for all the details!

### **Our 2025 schedule!  
**

  * Aug 16: C-47 "Hairless Joe" 

* * *

**C-47 Hairless Joe: August 16, 11am/12pm/1pm**

Pick a seat in the military transport aircraft that Dwight D. Eisenhower termed, as one of the most vital pieces of military equipment used in winning World War II.

[Buy Tickets Now](https://prod1.agileticketing.net/websales/pages/info.aspx?evtinfo=431029~9314946d-6e2e-4182-a40f-57436f01352e&epguid=35e793e9-9c40-4ad3-908d-8ab1b4ae8618&)

**Additional Information**

Aircraft depart from the Air Zoo's Flight Discovery Center

Opportunities to walk-around the aircraft will be available when time and safety permits. These times cannot be determined in advance.

Flights are operated and sold by [Michigan Flight Museum](https://miflightmuseum.org/), there is no member discounts for Air Zoo members.

## [Activities](activities)

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility & Inclusion

### **Accessibility**

The Air Zoo strives to be a safe and welcoming place for all people to experience the history and science of aviation and aerospace in a meaningful way, by reducing hardships wherever possible and providing necessary ADA accommodations. Visit [Wheel the World](https://wheeltheworld.com/places-to-go/estados-unidos/portage/air-zoo-aerospace-science-museum) for more information regarding our accessible spaces and experiences.

**Parking**

****Accessible parking spaces are located near the main entrance of both the Flight Innovation Center and the Flight Discovery Center. Vehicles parked in these locations must display a state issued disability license plate or placard. All parking at the Air Zoo is free.

**Wheelchairs & Wagons**

****The Air Zoo maintains a limited number of wheelchairs and wagons for guest use. They can be checked out, free of charge, upon check-in. Please see a Guest Experience Ambassador at the Ticket Counter or Membership Desk for details.

All galleries are wheelchair-, wagon-, and stroller-accessible.

The Missions Theater has limited accessibility space at the ground level entrance to the theatre. Limited companion seating is also available.

**Restrooms**

****All Air Zoo restrooms are accessible to guests with disabilities.

Gender-neutral, single-stall restrooms are available in the Space Wing of the Flight Innovation Center.

**Nursing Room**

A private nursing/pumping room is located on the 2nd fl...

Each Friday, Saturday, and Sunday in February

[Learn More >](https://www.airzoo.org/open-cockpits)

##### We welcome you to the Air Zoo!

# Our Commitment to You

We are committed to providing our guests with inclusive, immersive, and engaging experiences every day. Our goal is to provide our guests, staff, and volunteers with a safe place to gather, to imagine, explore, discover and to be inspired - it is our highest priority. As you [plan your visit](/plan-your-visit), please, take a moment to review our[ policies and procedures](/new-policies-and-procedures) prior to your visit. We look forward to seeing you soon!

##### PLAN YOUR VISIT

# Limitless Adventures

We have two exciting centers on our campus. Both are open 360+ days a year and are easily accessible by car or a 5-minute walk. Our free shuttle runs between Flight Centers, subject on staffing availability and extreme weather conditions, please check with the ticket counter on your arrival for current status. 

### Air Zoo Flight Centers' Hours:

  * **Mon - Sat:** 9am-5pm
